Title: Salesforce Core Developers
Description:
Role Description
This is a full-time, remote role for a Salesforce Core Developer. The primary responsibility includes designing, developing, debugging, and implementing Salesforce solutions to meet specified business needs. Key tasks include working on software development, integrating Salesforce with other platforms, optimizing back-end functionalities, and utilizing object-oriented programming. Collaboration with cross-functional teams to design efficient and scalable solutions will also be integral to the role.
Qualifications
• Support and maintain Sales, Service, and Education Clouds.
• Configure and optimize Salesforce Sales Cloud for lead and opportunity management
• Configure/customize Salesforce workflows, approvals, case management, and student lifecycle features.
• Develop custom logic and UI using Apex, Visualforce, LWC/Aura.
• Integrate Salesforce with external systems such PeopleSoft SIS, ERP, Sitefinity CMS and iPaaS (MuleSoft/Boomi).
Design, configure, and deploy Einstein Bots.
• Manage and ensure appropriate security roles, authorization and role based access control.
• Produce dashboards, reports and documentation.
• Manage release cycles via Salesforce DX, Git, CI/CD pipelines.
• 5+ years of experience as Salesforce Core Developer
• Proficiency in Apex, Visualforce, Lightning Components, SOQL, SOSL, REST/SOAP APIs.
• Hands-on experience with Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Education Cloud and Community Cloud.
• Experience with Einstein Bots and Agentforce.
• Knowledge of Salesforce DevOps and CI/CD.
• Salesforce certifications such as Platform Developer I/II, App Builder, Education Cloud Consultant, Sales Cloud Consultant are preferred.

Title: Deloitte Innovation Hub I Senior Power Platform Developer, Intelligent Automation, Cairo, Egypt
Description:
Power Platform Developer, Intelligent Automation, Cairo
Connect to your career at Deloitte
Deloitte, established globally in 1845, is the world’s largest and leading professional services firm, providing Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal and Consulting and related services to public and private clients spanning multiple industries. Present in more than 150 countries, Deloitte is distinct in its ability to help clients solve their most complex problems, from strategy to implementation.
Deloitte innovation hub (DIH) is a strategic initiative established by Deloitte North & South Europe (NSE) to support our ambition to become the leading business transformation partner of choice for our clients and to expand and scale our delivery footprint across EMEA. With access to a scaled, diverse, highly skilled, motivated, and engaged workforce, DIH is delivering complex technical solutions for clients’ most complex business problems, across portfolios that include ‘Strategy & Transactions’, ‘Customer’, ‘Engineering, AI & Data, ‘Enterprise, Technology & Performance’ and ‘Cyber’. DIH is aiming to become the destination for top talents in Egypt for a long, exciting career.
We invest in outstanding people of diverse talents and backgrounds and empower them to achieve more than they could elsewhere. Our work combines advice with action and integrity. We believe that when our clients and society are stronger, so are we. Our organization has grown in scale and diversity, providing services across the region, with our shared culture remaining the same. We aim to help clients realize their ambitions, make a positive difference in society, and maximize the success of our people. This drive fuels the commitment and humanity that run deep through our every action.
Your opportunity
Interested in joining our exciting and thriving Intelligent Automation practice?
We are recruiting Microsoft 365, Power Platform & Dynamics Consultants, specialising in intelligent automation and low code application development to join our team in Cairo.
This is an exciting opportunity to join a growing team which has been identified as a critical element of Deloitte’s next generation service provision. Demand for our services is higher than ever and we need experienced people who will grow and succeed with us.
You will be part of a diverse and strategically important team that focuses principally on implementing robotic and cognitive technology solutions to replicate human actions and mimic human judgement, to help our Clients improve workforce quality, speed and productivity. Working alongside colleagues from across the across the globe, Deloitte is an environment where you and your career can flourish.
The Intelligent Automation team focuses principally on implementing automation, cloud and artificial intelligence solutions to replicate human actions and mimic human judgement, to help our clients improve workforce quality, speed and productivity. We are looking to grow this high-demand and high-impact team, to help our clients address their greatest challenges. We offer opportunities for exciting and innovative work with clients across multiple sectors and with leading technologies, skills acquisition and professional knowledge growth.
We need the very best people to join us and that is where you come in!
Your role
As part of this team you would be working principally with Microsoft Power Platform applications (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI & Power Virtual Agents), Office 365, Azure and Dynamics, to address the challenges and automation ambitions of our clients and deliver results. As a Developer within this team, you have the opportunity to develop your career while working with multiple clients across all major industries in an innovative and dynamic environment.
As a Developer within our Intelligent Automation practice, your role will involve:
Working with our clients to understand the opportunity for automation within their organisation, and developing automation strategies, embedding principles, crafting roadmaps and business cases
Engaging in both advisory and implementation projects, from helping clients with their wider transformation strategies, to supporting the full lifecycle of delivery projects of Design, Develop, Pilot, Deploy, Test, Run
Understanding, evaluating, and re-imagining end-to-end processes within publicly sensitivity operations factored in, enabling the successful translation of automation needs into clear requirements for automation purposes
Undertaking requirements gathering (both process and technical), client interviewing, documentation of processes and process assessment
Working with stakeholders at all levels including senior stakeholders and across the Client, Deloitte and third parties (including software vendors)
Understanding the importance of stakeholder and change management and incorporating it into the implementation of automation strategies
Working effectively within inclusive and diverse teams within where people are recognised for their contribution, and actively supporting the development of individuals and teams, both formally and informally
Your work, your choice
At Deloitte we believe the best impact is the value we add, not the hours we sit at our desk. We, therefore, carefully consider agile ways of working, both formal and informal, that allow for the best impact for our people and our clients. If the working pattern you are looking for is not specifically indicated below, we are happy to discuss alternative arrangements.
Location: Cairo, with domestic and international travel per your clients’ requirements
Suggested work pattern: This is a permanent full-time opportunity, with a travel requirement, but with the opportunity to benefit from the Firm’s agile working practices.
Your Technical Experience
We expect you to have skills and experience in the following:
3 -6 years of developer experience with the Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, Power Virtual Agents), or Dynamics 365
Experience with Canvas, Model Driven and Portal apps
Microsoft certified in one or more of the following:
PL-900 – Power Platform Fundamentals
PL-100 – Power Platform App Maker Associate
PL-200 – Power Platform Functional Consultant Associate
MB-910 - Dynamics 365 Fundamentals (CRM)
MB-920 Dynamics 365 Fundamentals Finance and Operations Apps (ERP)
Experience with Microsoft Office 365 including SharePoint and Teams
Experience with Microsoft Azure products and services including Azure Logic Apps and the Azure AI Platform
Experience with Dataverse (Common Data Service) and SQL
Experience in HTML, Power FX and developing custom connectors
Experience creating managed and unmanaged solutions
Knowledge of how to interact with REST APIs and formats (JSON)
Experience working with agile and iterative delivery methods
Ability to analyse, understand business problems and document in a detailed design document
Proficiency in MS Office (Access, Outlook, Excel, PowerPoint) including macros creation
The following will be an added advantage:
Internal or external consultancy experience
Technical university degree
In-depth knowledge of alternative automation technologies / vendors such as Automation Anywhere, Be Informed, Blue Prism, NICE and UiPath
In-depth knowledge of alternative low code technologies / vendors such as Appian, Outsystems and Pega
Experience with cloud computing platform such as Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, and their cognitive service
Your professional experience
We are looking for a blend of business and technical skillsets. As such, to be successful you are required to:
Have a keen interest in intelligent automation, Microsoft, cloud-based technology and its implications for our clients’ organisation
Demonstrate an understanding of IA, familiarity with Microsoft technology and any of the key vendor platforms, and a clear understanding of the direction of travel in the market
Have experience in delivering IA programmes from opportunity identification, to live deployment and hyper-care
Demonstrate knowledge of process improvement, process design, business process mapping and experience in delivering end-to-end process reviews
Demonstrate experience managing complex stakeholder environments and relationships
Possess good problem solving and analytical skills
Demonstrate an ability to problem-solve in a creative manner
Be comfortable working within an agile delivery environment
Work effectively within an inclusive team and actively support the development of individuals and teams, both formally and informally
Core consulting skills
We expect that you possess the following core consulting skills:
A "can do" attitude; a hands-on and flexible approach to emerging requirements and a real willingness to learn and participate
Good communication, presentation, and people skills, with the ability to articulate complex ideas, technical and process conversations to different audiences within an organisation
Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to exercise mature judgment and escalate as appropriate
Experience of working in fast-paced and demanding delivery-focused environments, with ability to stay calm under pressure
Understanding and awareness of the commercial and reputational risks Deloitte may encounter and the appropriate mitigations
Connect to your service line - Technology and Transformation
Distinctive thinking, deep expertise, and collaborative working. That’s what connects us. That’s what makes us Deloitte. If you want to help solve some of the biggest challenges around, join us. Together, we’ll make an impact that matters.
Personal independence
Regulation and controls are standard practice in our industry and Deloitte is no exception. These controls provide important legal protection for both you and the firm. We are subject to several audit regulations, one of which requires that certain colleagues abide by specific personal independence constraints. This can mean that you and your "Immediate Family Members" are not permitted to hold certain financial interests (shares, funds, bonds etc.) with audit clients of the firm. The recruitment team will provide further detail as you progress through the recruitment process.
Connect to your Industry
“What attracted me to Deloitte were the endless opportunities and the collective experience of other like-minded individuals. Deloitte’s clients include many of the world’s largest organizations; I wanted to be part of a team that made a difference that I could be proud of.” -Dan, Consulting
Our commitment to you
Making an impact is more than just what we do: it’s why we’re here. So, we work hard to create an environment where you can experience a purpose you believe in, the freedom to be you, and the capacity to go further than ever before.
We want you. The true you. Your own strengths, perspective, and personality. So, we’re nurturing a culture where everyone belongs, feels supported and heard, and is empowered to make a valuable, personal contribution. You can be sure we’ll take your wellbeing seriously, too. Because it’s only when you’re comfortable and at your best that you can make the kind of impact you, and we, live for.
Your expertise is our capability, so we’ll make sure it never stops growing. Whether it’s from the complex work you do, or the people you collaborate with, you’ll learn every day. Through world-class development, you’ll gain invaluable technical and personal skills. Whatever your level, you’ll learn how to lead.
Connect to your next step
A career at Deloitte is an opportunity to develop in any direction you choose. Join us and you’ll experience a purpose you can believe in and an impact you can see. You’ll be free to bring your true self to work every day. And you’ll never stop growing, whatever your level.

Title: Medical Advisor Manager (Nephrologist/Cardiologist) - Delta
Description:
Job Title: Medical Scientific Liaison / Medical Advisor, CVRM - Delta
Introduction to role
It’s a Career opportunity for ambitious Cardiologists & Nephrologists in Delta region. Here you’ll have the opportunity make a significant difference to patients’ lives. With science at its heart, this is the place where breakthroughs born in the lab become transformative medicines – for the world’s most complex diseases. Answer unmet medical needs by pioneering the next wave of science, focusing on outcomes and shaping the patient ecosystem. With our ground-breaking pipeline, the outlook is bright. Be proud to be part of a place that has achieved so much yet is still moving forward. There’s no better time to join our global, growing enterprise as we lead the way for healthcare and society.
Accountabilities
In this role, you will deliver AstraZeneca's updated medical information to healthcare professionals through various channels. You will efficiently manage clinical studies, ensuring they meet quality, cost, and time standards, and provide monitoring services from start to finish. You will plan and complete projects, delivering progress reports as needed. Additionally, you will contribute to team development by sharing knowledge and coaching. You will ensure patient safety and compliance with adverse event reporting standards and manage the provision of named patient supplies in line with regulatory and ethical obligations. Lastly, you will coordinate pharmacovigilance systems to meet regulatory requirements and AstraZeneca standards.
Essential Experience
Master’s degree in medicine or a related field
Physician with at least 5 years of clinical experience in either the nephrology or cardiology departments!
Resident in Mansoura - Tanta - Zagazig is a must
Ready to Travel 50% of the time
Fluency in spoken and written English language
Desirable Skills/Experience
Pharmaceutical experience is an asset
Working towards MD/PHD
Ability to interact and manage a range of stakeholders both internally and externally
Knowledge of legislation relevant to Pharmaceutical Ecosystem
Deep interest and understanding of science
Strong collaborator and reflects strong influence capability
Possess effective communication and facilitation skills
At AstraZeneca, we change the practice of medicine and improve the patient experience by generating and communicating compelling medical evidence. We translate our wealth of medical and scientific expertise to ensure that the data we produce helps physicians better treat patients at every point in their journey. Our culture is one of openness and transparency, fused with ambition and drive. We work seamlessly and inclusively across teams, roles, and levels to leverage our diverse skills and go further together. Join us in our mission to redefine cardiovascular treatment and make a significant impact on patients' lives.
Date Posted
11-ديسمبر-2025
Closing Date
30-يناير-2026
AstraZeneca embraces diversity and equality of opportunity. We are committed to building an inclusive and diverse team representing all backgrounds, with as wide a range of perspectives as possible, and harnessing industry-leading skills. We believe that the more inclusive we are, the better our work will be. We welcome and consider applications to join our team from all qualified candidates, regardless of their characteristics. We comply with all applicable laws and regulations on non-discrimination in employment (and recruitment), as well as work authorization and employment eligibility verification requirements.

Title: Senior/Staff Machine Learning Engineer - Bidding (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
Description:
About Agoda
At Agoda, we bridge the world through travel. Our story began in 2005, when two lifelong friends and entrepreneurs, driven by their passion for travel, launched Agoda to make it easier for everyone to explore the world.
Today, we are part of Booking Holdings [NASDAQ: BKNG], with a diverse team of over 7,000 people from 90 countries, working together in offices around the globe. Every day, we connect people to destinations and experiences, with our great deals across our millions of hotels and holiday properties, flights, and experiences worldwide.
No two days are the same at Agoda. Data and technology are at the heart of our culture, fueling our curiosity and innovation. If you’re ready to begin your best journey and help build travel for the world, join us.
Get to Know Our Team
The Engineering department oversees all Agoda’s ML and software related requirements. Our goal is to enable and increase Agoda’s business through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, ML driven solutions, queue systems and data monitoring tools. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the engineering team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the ML engineering squad, but also the reward. We work across structured and non-structured data at scale. For example, our current ML models process millions of images every day to try and enhance the experience that our users get from our app.
Why Agoda Engineering Team (ML role)?
Our engineering teams are at the intersection of business analytics, ml engineering, data warehousing and software engineering. Our job involves dealing with distributed systems, stream processing, ml modeling and computation at tens of PB Scale. We focus on software engineering related to data replication, storage, centralized computation, and Data API’s. By providing our users with ML products/tools, shared frameworks, and ML services, we enable our company to validate strategic decisions, make smarter choices, and react to the fast-changing world. We are a small but passionate team with people from different nationalities working together on a single goal.
In this Role, you will get to:
Lead the team technically in improving scalability, stability, accuracy, speed and efficiency of our existing ML systems and processes. Build, administer and scale ML processing pipelines.
Be comfortable navigating the following technology stack: Python3, Scala Spark, scripting (Bash/Python), Hadoop, SQL, S3 etc.
Should be able to understand internals of ML models such as LightGBM, Random Forest, CNN, Regression models, etc
Design, build, test and deploy new libraries, frameworks or full systems for our core systems while keeping to the highest standards of testing and code quality.
Work with experienced engineers and product owners to identify and build tools to automate many large-scale data management / analysis tasks.
We believe in end-to-end ownership; this role will involve taking and building systems that enable us to deliver ML models to production at a scale.
What You’ll need to Succeed:
Bachelor’s degree in computer science /information systems/engineering/related field 6+ years of experience in software engineering with a minimum of 4+ years in ML
Expert in SQL, Python3, and JVM based programming language – ie, Java or Scala
Expert in software design/design patterns, functional programming and object-oriented programming.
Analytical problem-solving capabilities & experience. A strong engineering driven mindset will be required to succeed in this role.
It’s great if you have:
Good understanding of Hadoop ecosystems and Big Data architecture and techologies
Experience working with Open-source products
Experience with Scala development
Working in an agile environment using test driven methodologies
Systems administration skills in Linux
Benefits
Hybrid Working Model
WFH Set Up Allowance
30 Days of Remote Working from anywhere globally every year
Employee discount for accommodation globally
Global team of 90+ nationalities
40+ offices and 25+ countries
Annual CSR / Volunteer Time off
Benevity Subscription for employee donations
Volunteering opportunities globally
Free Headspace subscription
Free Odilo & Udemy subscriptions
Access to Employee Assistance Program (third party for personal and workplace support)
Enhanced Parental Leave
Life, TPD & Accident Insurance

Title: B2B Sales Specialist
Description:
Majaal Company for Building Materials Import
is seeking a highly professional and ambitious
B2B Sales Specialist
to support our market expansion in the
Western Region (Tripoli)
.
If you have a strong record in closing corporate deals, exceptional negotiation skills, and full professional fluency in English, we would be pleased to hear from you.
Location and Company Setup:
Work Location:
Tripoli - Libya (Residency in Tripoli is a mandatory requirement).
Company Headquarters:
Benghazi.
Job Objective:
To effectively achieve the company's commercial goals by building strong, profitable relationships with key clients (B2B), identifying and penetrating new market segments in the Western Region, and supporting the overall expansion strategy.
Core Responsibilities & Tasks:
Corporate Account Management:
Strategically develop and maintain robust, direct relationships with targeted corporate clients and key accounts to ensure long-term business continuity and trust.
Sales Cycle Management:
Lead the entire B2B sales cycle, from initial prospecting and lead generation to contract negotiation and closing large-scale, profitable deals.
Pipeline & Funnel Management:
Actively manage and maintain a healthy sales pipeline, utilizing CRM tools to track progress, forecast sales accurately, and report on key performance indicators (KPIs).
Proposal Development:
Prepare professional, customized, and technically accurate quotations, bids, and presentations tailored to corporate client specifications and projects.
Market Penetration & Business Development:
Proactively identify and analyze new business opportunities, construction projects, and emerging market segments to achieve sustainable growth and meet expansion targets.
Internal Coordination:
Efficiently follow up on client orders, liaise seamlessly with internal departments (based in Benghazi) to ensure smooth logistics and accurate delivery timelines.
·
Reporting & Analysis:
Prepare and submit detailed, periodic sales performance reports, market analysis, and revenue forecasts to the
Sales and Commercial Manager/Director
.
·
Product Knowledge:
Maintain expert-level knowledge of our range of imported building materials and industry trends to effectively position products against competitors.
Ideal Candidate Requirements:
Education:
University Degree (Bachelor's degree minimum).
Experience:
Previous successful experience in
B2B sales
or Corporate Account/Client Service management is strongly preferred. Experience in the building materials or construction sector is a significant advantage.
Language Skills:
Full professional fluency in English (spoken and written) is mandatory.
Core Competencies:
Demonstrated proficiency in high-stakes
negotiation and persuasion skills
.
Excellent professional communication and interpersonal skills for effective interaction with all management levels.
Residency:
Current residency in Tripoli- Libya is a fundamental, non-negotiable requirement.
﻿
We are looking for professionals passionate about excellence and eager to contribute significantly to our expansion story.
To Apply:
Please send your updated Curriculum Vitae (CV) to:
hr@majaal.ly

Title: Senior Drilling / Well Engineer (mid-career)
Description:
SLB is seeking a qualified and motivated
Senior Drilling / Well Engineer (mid-career)
to provide well engineering and operational support for one or more rigs or well sites. This role offers the opportunity to lead complex drilling and well operations and contribute to optimized well design and execution with a global energy technology leader.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and deliver optimized technical well designs, including
Well Proposals, Basis of Design, and Well Programs
(Drilling, Completion, Workover).
Provide technical and operational support throughout project execution.
Prepare
well schedules, cost estimates, budgets, and End of Well Reports
.
Support multiple PL operations with collaborative and optimized program design.
Perform
Assistant Well Site Leader duties
as part of development requirements.
Provide real-time operational support and assist in
incident response and investigations
.
Participate in
HARCs and other risk assessments
, ensuring full compliance with HSE standards.
Analyze execution versus design, capture lessons learned, and identify continuous improvement opportunities.
Participate in service company, supplier, and equipment evaluation.
Communicate effectively with customers, PLs, contractors, and third parties.
Monitor daily operational performance and recommend optimization using technology where applicable.
Conduct engineering studies to address recurring well issues and implement corrective actions.
Support critical wellsite operations as needed.
Candidate Requirements:
7–10 years of experience
in drilling and well engineering
Bachelor’s degree in
Petroleum Engineering
or related discipline
Strong expertise in drilling design, well construction, and operations
Solid understanding of
HSE practices, risk management, and industry standards
Excellent analytical, troubleshooting, and communication skills
Proficiency in
English and Arabic
Ability to work in a fast-paced, multicultural environment
What We Offer:
Full-time, direct-hire position
Opportunity to work with a
global leader in energy technology
Safety-focused, dynamic, and collaborative work environment
Career growth and development opportunities at SLB
📍
Location:
Benghazi, Libya
📌
Employment Type:
Full-time
🔗
Apply officially:
https://careers.slb.com/jobdescription.aspx?id=EF12789

Title: Senior Well Engineer
Description:
SLB is seeking a highly experienced and motivated
Well Superintendent / Senior Well Engineer
to oversee well engineering and operational support for one or more rigs or well sites. This role offers the opportunity to lead complex well operations, optimize technical designs, and contribute to operational excellence with a global energy technology leader.
Key Responsibilities:
• Develop and deliver optimized technical well designs, including Well Proposals, Basis of Design, and Well Programs (Drilling, Completion, Workover).
• Provide technical and operational support throughout project execution.
• Prepare well schedules, cost estimates, project budgets, well control briefings, and End of Well Reports.
• Support multiple PL operations with collaborative and optimized program design.
• Perform Assistant Well Site Leader duties as part of development requirements.
• Provide real-time operational support and assist in incident response and investigations.
• Participate in HARCs and other risk assessments, ensuring full compliance with HSE standards.
• Analyze execution versus design, capture lessons learned, and identify continuous improvement opportunities.
• Participate in service company, supplier, and equipment evaluation.
• Communicate effectively with customers, PLs, contractors, and third parties.
• Monitor daily operational performance and recommend optimization using technology where applicable.
• Conduct engineering studies to address recurring well issues and implement corrective actions.
• Support critical wellsite operations as needed.
Candidate Requirements:
• 7–10 years of experience in well engineering and well operations
• Bachelor’s degree in Petroleum Engineering or related discipline
• Strong expertise in drilling design, well construction, and operations
• Solid understanding of HSE practices, risk management, and industry standards
• Excellent analytical, troubleshooting, and communication skills
• Proficiency in English and Arabic
• Ability to work in a fast-paced, multicultural environment
What We Offer:
• Full-time, direct-hire position
• Opportunity to work with a global leader in energy technology
• Safety-focused, dynamic, and collaborative work environment
• Career growth and development opportunities at SLB
📍
Location:
Benghazi, Libya
📌
Employment Type:
Full-time
🔗
Apply officially:
https://careers.slb.com/jobdescription.aspx?id=EF12790

Title: Marketing Communications Manager
Description:
About the Hiring Company:
Madar Al-Mustaqbal for E-Commerce and Information Technology is one of the leading companies in Libya specializing in the development and operation of digital applications and services. We empower individuals and businesses through innovative solutions in the world of e-commerce and technology. Our environment is dynamic, ambitious, and results-oriented, with a strong belief in creativity and teamwork as the foundation for building an advanced digital future.
Your Mission as a Marketing Communications Manager:
You will be responsible for planning, executing, and managing integrated marketing campaigns across various channels (ATL, BTL, and Digital). Your mission is to effectively communicate the company’s messages and brand identity to the target audience while managing internal and external marketing resources efficiently.
You will be handling these duties and responsibilities as a Marketing Communications Manager:
Managing Advertising Campaigns (ATL & BTL):
Coordinate with external advertising agencies to secure media placements (TV, radio, outdoor).
Oversee the production and distribution of printed promotional materials (brochures, flyers, etc.).
Contribute creative marketing ideas to enhance application visibility.
Digital Content & Creative Management:
Work with designers and video editors to produce campaign assets.
Liaise with content writers (in-house or freelance) to ensure timely and high-quality digital content.
Manage influencer relationships and ensure planned collaborations are executed smoothly.
Coordination & Monitoring:
Ensure brand message consistency across all communication channels.
Monitor campaign timelines and budgets.
Prepare regular performance reports for all marketing channels.
Qualifications and Skills that will allow you to thrive as a Marketing Communications Manager:
experience in marketing communications or campaign management.
Strong knowledge of digital marketing strategies and social media management.
Proven ability to manage relationships with external agencies and vendors (designers, printers, media companies).
Excellent organizational and multitasking skills.
Proficiency in Arabic; English language skills are a strong plus.
Additional Information
:
Working Days & Hours:
9 to 4, Saturday to Thursday.
Location:
Abu Sitta – Tripoli
Apply through: https://www.ejad.ly/jobs/6968603-marketing-communications-manager-at-madar-al-mustaqbal?promotion=1767481-trackable-share-link-lipp

Title: Sales Engineer
Description:
About the Hiring Company:
The hiring company is a pioneering entity in the oil and gas sector, established in the early 1980s. Renowned for its innovative and technically superior solutions, the company has expanded its global footprint across the Middle East, the Americas, and Africa. With a steadfast commitment to quality and efficiency, they have developed a robust network of sales offices, manufacturing facilities, and service centers, all backed by advanced R&D capabilities. The company is dedicated to addressing the industry's most challenging environments, continuously improving reliability and efficiency in its operations.
Your Mission as a Sales Engineer:
As a Sales Engineer, your core mission is to deliver optimized ESP system solutions aligned with client specifications, ensuring the highest standards of application, safety, and operational excellence. You will act as a key liaison between the client and internal teams to drive performance, ensure quality service delivery, and maintain seamless communication throughout the ESP lifecycle.
You will be handling these duties and responsibilities as a Sales Engineer:
Monitor and manage monthly maintenance invoicing and installation reports.
Provide weekly and monthly ESP performance and dashboard reports to clients.
Track consumption levels of ESP spare parts to prevent shortages.
Conduct monthly reconciliations of actual vs. system inventory.
Conduct regular client visits to gather ESP application requirements and align internal resources.
Monitor daily ESP and well performance; analyze monthly well data for efficiency tracking.
Address and resolve HSE non-conformities promptly.
Communicate safety concerns and preventative recommendations to clients.
Qualifications and Skills that will allow you to thrive as a Sales Engineer:
Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering or Petroleum Engineering.
4–8 years of hands-on experience in ESP oilfield rig and maintenance operations.
Strong background in ESP application, troubleshooting, installation, and commissioning.
Solid experience in client relationship management and upstream oil and gas processes.
Proficiency in technical reporting and data analysis.
Excellent communication and client interaction skills.
Strong PC literacy and fluent English communication.
Additional Information:
Work Type:
Office-based
Locations:
Benghazi - Libya
Apply through:https://www.ejad.ly/jobs/6939304-sales-engineer-esp-at-inter-oil-and-gas-service-co?promotion=1767484-trackable-share-link-lipp

Title: أخصائي مبيعات وتسويق
Description:
We are looking for a motivated and results-driven Sales & Marketing Specialist to join our team and help promote Kontrol, our innovative health and diabetes management application. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies, increasing app downloads and engagement, and building strong relationships with healthcare professionals, patients, and partners.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and implement marketing strategies to increase awareness and adoption of the Kontrol app.
- Identify and pursue new sales opportunities, partnerships, and collaborations.
- Conduct market research to understand customer needs and industry trends.
- Create engaging content for digital platforms, social media, newsletters, and campaigns.
- Track, analyze, and report marketing and sales performance metrics.
- Build and maintain strong relationships with healthcare providers, clinics, and relevant organizations.
- Collaborate with product and development teams to ensure marketing aligns with product features and updates.
- Represent the company at events, conferences, and promotional activities.
Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or related field.
- Proven experience in sales and marketing, preferably in healthcare, digital health, or mobile apps.
- Strong communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
- Proficiency in digital marketing tools, social media platforms, and analytics.
- Self-motivated, creative, and able to work independently as well as part of a team.
- Passion for health technology and patient-centered solutions.
Preferred Skills:
- Knowledge of diabetes management or healthcare apps.
- Experience in B2B and B2C marketing strategies.
- Multilingual abilities are a plus.

Title: Senior Test Engineer
Description:
About the Hiring Company:
A top international oil and gas service company, known for its commitment to innovation, specializes in guiding the energy sector towards enhanced efficiency and sustainability. With opportunities for career advancement and a strong emphasis on employee growth, working here is highly valued. They offer solutions in digital transformation and decarbonization, underlining their dedication to reducing environmental impacts. This pioneering company, with a history spanning several decades, is recognized for its significant contributions to a sustainable energy future.
Your Mission as a Well Testing Engineer:
As a Well Testing Engineer, your mission is to plan, execute, and evaluate well testing operations with precision and safety. You will be at the forefront of delivering high-quality data for reservoir evaluation and field development, contributing directly to the success of our offshore and deepwater projects.
You Will Be Handling These Duties and Responsibilities as a Well Testing Engineer:
Execute offshore and deepwater well testing operations safely and efficiently.
Design, plan, and review well test procedures and equipment readiness.
Operate and monitor well testing equipment and systems on site.
Analyze well test data and report findings to support engineering decisions.
Ensure compliance with all safety standards and environmental regulations.
Liaise with offshore teams and onshore engineering support.
Troubleshoot technical issues during testing operations.
Maintain accurate documentation and logs throughout the testing process.
Qualifications and Skills That Will Allow You to Thrive as a Well Testing Engineer:
Proven experience in well testing operations, particularly offshore and deepwater.
Valid
FOET (Further Offshore Emergency Training)
certificate – mandatory.
Engineering degree in Petroleum, Mechanical, or related discipline preferred.
Strong understanding of well testing tools, flow measurement, and data interpretation.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to perform under pressure.
Ability to work in rotational offshore schedules.
Additional Information
Working Days & Hours:
Rotation (4x4 or 6x3).
Location:
Offshore - Libya.
Apply through:https://www.ejad.ly/jobs/6982778-well-testing-engineer-at-top-international-oil-gas-co?promotion=1767491-trackable-share-link-lipp

Title: Frontend Software Developer
Description:
About the Hiring Company:
Madar Al-Mustaqbal for E-Commerce and Information Technology is one of the leading companies in Libya specializing in the development and operation of digital applications and services. We empower individuals and businesses through innovative solutions in the world of e-commerce and technology. Our environment is dynamic, ambitious, and results-oriented, with a strong belief in creativity and teamwork as the foundation for building an advanced digital future.
Your Mission as a Frontend Software Developer:
As a Frontend Software Developer, your mission is to craft high-quality mobile applications using Flutter, while also contributing to responsive web interfaces when required. You'll be instrumental in transforming product ideas into seamless, visually compelling digital experiences that run smoothly across platforms. Your contributions will directly shape user satisfaction and business success in our ever-evolving startup landscape.
You will be handling these duties and responsibilities as a Frontend Software Developer:
Develop and maintain cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter
Assist in developing and optimizing web front-end components (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue/React)
Collaborate closely with backend developers using Laravel and NodeJS for seamless API integration
Ensure applications are responsive, intuitive, and deliver a premium user experience

Troubleshoot issues, fix bugs, and continuously improve app performance

Proven experience in developing mobile applications using Flutter

Experience with frontend frameworks like Vue.js or React is a strong plus
Understanding of backend systems (Laravel and/or NodeJS) and API integrations

Title: Director of Meeting & Events (H/F)
Description:
Description du poste
Le Mövenpick Mansour Eddahbi Marrakech recrute un(e) Director of Meetings & Events
, chargé(e) du pilotage stratégique et opérationnel de l’ensemble des activités Meetings & Events (MICE) du resort. Le/la titulaire du poste assurera la coordination des équipes internes et des partenaires externes afin de garantir des événements parfaitement exécutés, rentables et conformes aux standards de qualité, tout en offrant une expérience client d’excellence.
Stratégie & développement Meetings & Events
Définir et mettre en œuvre la stratégie Meetings & Events en cohérence avec les objectifs commerciaux et l’image de marque du resort.
Contribuer au développement du chiffre d’affaires MICE et à l’optimisation de la rentabilité des événements.
Collaborer étroitement avec les équipes Sales, Marketing et Revenue afin de maximiser les opportunités commerciales.
Planification & coordination des événements
Superviser la planification et l’exécution de tous les événements professionnels : réunions, séminaires, conférences, congrès, lancements de produits et événements corporate.
Agir en tant qu’interlocuteur privilégié entre les clients, les départements opérationnels (Banquets, F&B, Technique, Hébergement, Sécurité, Housekeeping) et les prestataires externes.
Assurer la coordination de l’ensemble des aspects logistiques et techniques : salles, scénographie, audiovisuel, restauration, staffing et flux participants.
Être présent(e) sur site lors des événements clés afin de garantir une exécution fluide et conforme aux engagements contractuels.
Gestion opérationnelle & qualité
Garantir le respect des standards de service, des procédures internes et des normes Accor / Mövenpick.
Anticiper et résoudre les problématiques opérationnelles dans un environnement dynamique et exigeant.
Veiller à la conformité avec les réglementations locales, les normes de sécurité, de santé et de sécurité incendie.
Gestion financière & performance
Élaborer, suivre et contrôler les budgets Meetings & Events.
Analyser les coûts, marges et indicateurs de performance afin d’optimiser la rentabilité des événements.
Assurer la préparation et la validation des clôtures financières et des décomptes clients.
Management & leadership
Encadrer, former et développer les équipes Meetings & Events et Banquets.
Favoriser une culture de collaboration, de performance et d’excellence opérationnelle.
Mettre en place des procédures, outils et bonnes pratiques pour améliorer l’efficacité et la qualité du service.
Expérience client
Assurer un haut niveau de satisfaction client avant, pendant et après chaque événement.
Collecter et analyser les retours clients afin d’améliorer continuellement l’offre Meetings & Events.
Positionner le resort comme une destination de référence pour les événements professionnels et corporate.
Profil & Qualifications
Expérience significative dans la gestion des Meetings & Events / MICE, idéalement au sein d’hôtels de luxe.
Solide expérience en management d’équipes opérationnelles et transverses.
Excellente maîtrise des opérations Banquets et Events ainsi que des aspects techniques et logistiques.
Expérience avérée en gestion budgétaire, analyse financière et optimisation de la rentabilité.
Excellentes compétences en communication, négociation et relation client.
Forte capacité d’organisation, de priorisation et de gestion du stress.
Connaissance des normes de sécurité, des réglementations locales et des standards qualité.
Flexibilité requise (soirées, week-ends et jours fériés).

Title: Responsable Ordonnancement & Planification
Description:
Dans le cadre du développement de nos activités, nous sommes à la recherche d'un Responsable Ordonnancement et Planification pour rejoindre notre station de conditionnement :
Missions et responsabilités :
Planifier et gérer des opérations de production.
Optimiser et coordonner les flux de produits pour éviter toute rupture dans la chaîne de production.
Superviser la gestion des stocks.
Répartir la charge de travail en fonction des machines et des opérateurs disponibles.
Ajuster en permanence les plannings en fonction des aléas (pannes de machines, congés, stocks, etc.).
Assurer le suivi et le respect des délais de production.
Coordonner des installations de production.
Définir un dispositif de suivi de production.
Coordonner l'activité d'une équipe.
Profil recherché :
Formation de niveau Bac +5
Master en logistique, gestion de la production, achats
Diplôme d’école d’ingénieurs
Diplôme d’école de commerce

Title: Responsable Financier
Description:
Rejoignez Royal Air Maroc en tant que Responsable Financier
Basé(e) au sein de la Direction Financière, vous contribuerez activement au pilotage financier et à la fiabilité des informations comptables et financières, dans un environnement structuré et exigeant. Ce poste joue un rôle clé dans la performance financière et la conformité réglementaire de la compagnie, avec une ouverture possible à l’international.
Missions
En tant que Responsable Financier, vous aurez pour principales responsabilités :
Produire la comptabilité générale dans les délais impartis, analyser les comptes et en garantir la fiabilité.
Contrôler l’exhaustivité des recettes et des encaissements, dans le respect des procédures en vigueur.
Assurer la conformité avec la réglementation fiscale et sociale.
Suivre les crédits clients et fournisseurs et veiller à la maîtrise des risques associés.
Assurer le suivi des réalisations budgétaires et analyser les écarts.
Gérer la trésorerie du périmètre concerné et contribuer à son optimisation.
Profil recherché
Formation :
Bac+5 en Finance, Audit ou Contrôle de gestion
Expérience :
Minimum 2 ans dans un poste similaire
Compétences :
Solide maîtrise de la comptabilité générale et des processus financiers
Rigueur, autonomie, sens de l’organisation et esprit d’analyse
Capacité à travailler en transversal avec différents interlocuteurs
Parfaite maîtrise du français et de l’anglais
La connaissance de SAP constitue un atout

Title: IT PROJECTS MANAGER (CHEF DE PROJETS IT)
Description:
RIBATIS , Opérateur de la transformation digitale dans le domaine du #eGOV, cherche à #Recruter un #CHEF de #PROJETS #IT :
- Missions
:
·       Organiser et coordonner
les opérations d’avant-vente et de réponse aux appels d’offres
et consultations restreintes ;
·       Constituer, organiser et piloter
l’équipe projet
;
·       Établir
les plannings de réalisation des projets
selon des logiques de gestion classique ou agile ;
·       Évaluer
les risques et les enjeux du projet
et établir
le plan assurance qualité
associé ;
·       Alimenter et maintenir à jour
le Backlog projet
et animer
les sessions de planification et de clôture des sprints
;
·       Contrôler, en tant que coordinateur,
la qualité des développements
et des releases livrées
;
·       Assurer
l’interfaçage avec le client
entant que principal interlocuteur ;
·       Accompagner
les consultants fonctionnels et techniques
dans les ateliers de collecte de besoins et coordination avec les équipes clients ;
·       Organiser, préparer
les supports de présentation
et animer
les comités de suivi et de pilotage
projet ;
·       Assurer
la revue des livrables documentaires
sur le plan fond et forme avant leur communication au client ;
·       Assurer
la réception des livrables
par le client et
le paiement des échéances
contractuelles ;
·       Maitriser scrupuleusement
le périmètre contractuel
du projet, qualifier
les demandes client
et statuer sur
leur prise en charge
dans le périmètre initial ou entant qu’évolutions ;
·       Faire un
compte rendu
à sa hiérarchie comme à son client ;
·       Boucler
le projet en temps et en heure
, en répondant au mieux au budget et aux attentes exprimées ;
·       Évaluer
la rentabilité financière
du projet ;
·       Assurer
la maintenance des projets
dans le cadre de la garantie ou à travers le contrat de maintenance associé ;
·       Maintenir
la relation avec le client
au-delà du projet et assurer
la vente d’extensions du projet
à chaque fois que l’opportunité se présente.
---------------------
Pour toute personne intéressée, prière de nous adresser vos candidatures sur rh@ribatis.com en précisant au niveau de l'objet de l'émail l'offre pour laquelle vous postulez.
#Hiring #Chef_Projets_IT #ChefprojetsIT
Profil
Profil
- Formation initiale
: BAC+5 en IT
- Expérience
: Au moins une année probante dans un poste équivalent
- Savoir-être
: Une personne :
·       Sait écouter/dialoguer ;

Title: Quality Assurance Engineer
Description:
Date: 12 Nov 2025
Company: Air Arabia Maroc (3O)
Location:
MA
Country: MA
Job Purpose
To execute, monitor and follow up on Quality Assurance audit plans and reviews and surveillance as directed by “Quality Assurance Manager”. Follow up on corrective measures in line with Air Arabia quality standards and DAC/CAA and regulatory bodies’ requirements to ensure compliance with the same across all functions and areas of operation.
Key Result Responsibilities
Maintains the Quality Assurance System adopted for internal procedures, processes and products audits, surveillance and spot checks in accordance with DAC/CAA/CARs/IOSA/EASA standards and requirements.
Participates in updating and communicating the regulations of DAC/CAA in the corresponding manuals such as MOE, CAMO, etc. in coordination with corresponding personnel in operations and engineering departments
Reviews the internal quality standards and regulatory requirements on regular basis in accordance with Air Arabia/DAC approvals; highlights any variances or changes needed to the “Quality Assurance Manager” accordingly.
Contributes to the preparation and executing of internal annual audit plan; this includes regular audit checks, new checks, as well as urgent audit reviews; carries out assigned audit plan in accordance with approved checklists.
Cooperates with the department heads/managers to communicate and execute the audit schedules timely; maintains effective and on-going communication on updates to ensure successful results; sends out necessary notifications for concerned parties prior to agreed schedules to allow needed arrangements from their side.
Partners with Stakeholders and “Quality Assurance Manager” to gather necessary historical data, documentation, and feedback to ensure that all established operations and procedures adopted in the Company are satisfactory.
Identifies root causes and assists in formulating and monitoring the adherence to comprehensive corrective actions for regulatory audits; records the findings and corrective actions in system for verification, follow up, and database purposes.
Key Result Responsibilities - Continued
Assists the “Quality Assurance Manager” in developing and monitoring the adherence to Quality Assurance policies, procedures, and manuals in accordance with Company’s requirements; supports in developing Quality Assurance awareness across the different functions through Bulletins, inter-service memos, PPT, presentations, workshops, etc...
Performs safety and quality audits and conducts periodic review approvals on Suppliers, Vendors, Subcontractors, Simulator, Ramp and Outstations, this includes but not limited to: MROs, GHAs, Fuel Companies, Cargo, Engines, etc.; raises and follows-up on findings or CAPA in Q-Pulse and with concerned owners.
Reviews MDD/ADD/CDL and Reliability reports and ensures comprehensive audit and conformance reports are produced and communicated to regulatory bodies in due time; highlights areas of concern where urgent attention and improvement are needed.
Ensures effective liaison with regulatory authorities and other operationally relevant external entities.
Maintains and regularly updates necessary records related to Quality Assurance Audits such as personnel authorization files, dispensation files, deviations, and concessions.
Supports the Engineering Department with new licenses aiming for continuation of training and enhancing capabilities ensuring the licenses are processed and issued as per regulations.
Assists in the aircrafts delivery/redelivery process and Airworthiness Certificates renewal in coordination with “Airworthiness Review Certification Engineer”.
Qualifications (Academic, Training, Languages)
Bachelor degree in Aircraft Engineering or equivalent; alternately a diploma or certificate in the related field/ a licenced technician combined with experience and exposure required to fulfil the position requirements.
Certificates related to Auditing, Quality Assurance and/or Compliance such as IOSA or ISO – Lead Assessor are highly desirable and some may be treated as conditional for this role.
Project Management certificate or alternately the proven corresponding working experience is nice to have.
Proficient in Microsoft Office (Advanced Excel and PowerPoint), Internet and Web Search.
Excellent command over written and verbal communication skills: reporting, presentations, etc.
Fluent in English Language, Arabic Language is a plus.
Work Experience
5+ years of related working experience in Quality Assurance/Audit in the aviation/airline industry.
Extensive exposure to the Civil Aviation Authorities and regulatory bodies’ legal requirements, preferably DAC and/or EASA/FAA; familiar with regulations pertaining to Licensing, procedures, and manuals.
Knowledgeable with working exposure to Commercial /Safety/Internal & External Audit practices.
A very good knowledge and exposure on airline Engineering and Flight Operations, standard regulations.
Aircrafts technical knowledge and relative exposure to aircrafts maintenance requirements is a plus.
Possesses an in-depth knowledge in documentation control systems.
Experienced in designing procedures and manuals as per business needs and in line with adopted regulations and approved quality standards.
Analytical thinking, efficiency and commitment to successful results.
Proven skills in analysing data, identifying pitfalls and recommending corrective measures.
Cost-oriented, possesses effective problem solving and decision making skills.
High accuracy and attention to details.

Title: Responsable Supply Chain
Description:
Notre client est un acteur majeur de la distribution spécialisée dans l’électroménager, le multimédia et les nouvelles technologies. Dans le cadre du renforcement de ses équipes, nous recherchons un(e) Responsable Supply Chain pour accompagner sa croissance et contribuer à l’optimisation de ses opérations.
Missions principales :
En tant que Responsable Supply Chain, vous serez garant(e) de la performance et de la fluidité de toute la chaîne d’approvisionnement. Vos responsabilités incluront :
Définir et piloter la stratégie supply chain en lien avec les objectifs de l’entreprise.
Optimiser les processus logistiques : approvisionnement, stockage, distribution et gestion des flux.
Superviser la planification de la demande et les prévisions des ventes.
Assurer le suivi des indicateurs de performance (KPI) et mettre en place des plans d’amélioration continue.
Manager et développer les compétences des équipes supply chain.
Négocier et gérer les relations avec les prestataires logistiques et transporteurs.
Garantir le respect des coûts, délais et standards de qualité de service.
Profil recherché :
Formation Bac+5 en Supply Chain Management, Logistique ou équivalent.
Expérience confirmée (5 à 8 ans) dans un poste similaire, idéalement dans la distribution ou la grande consommation.
Maîtrise des outils ERP et des logiciels de gestion logistique.
Solides compétences analytiques et sens de l’organisation.
Leadership, orientation résultats et capacité à travailler dans un environnement dynamique.

Title: Sales Development Representative
Description:
Entreprise :
Présent dans plus de 20 pays et ayant une solide expertise dans l’édition et l’intégration des logiciels destinés aux banques et institutions financières, Adria Business & Technology est bien plus qu’un prestataire des projets de digital Banking, c’est d’abord une famille soudée et engagée dans une aventure unique et collective fondée sur l’innovation, l’esprit d’équipe et le challenge !
Notre force réside dans l’implication de nos collaborateurs qui, grâce à leur savoir, savoir-faire et savoir-être, nous permettent de nous évoluer continuellement et efficacement, en proposant à nos clients des solutions personnalisables à la pointe de la technologie, et en nous positionnant de cette manière comme un des leaders incontestés de notre secteur !
Notre approche :
Adria Business & Technology, quand la haute technologie s’allie à la banque !
Combinant valeur ajoutée et efficacité des solutions délivrées, notre mission est d’accompagner les établissements financiers dans la mise en place de leurs projets de digitalisation via nos solutions technologiques et progiciels spécialisés !
Pourquoi choisir Adria :
Si vous aussi :
-vous avez le sens de l’implication et de l’engagement
-vous aimez l’innovation et le challenge
-vous souhaitez travailler dans une ambiance chaleureuse et sereine
Vous êtes au bon endroit, vous n’avez qu’à soumettre votre candidature pour faire partie de notre belle famille Adria !
Et parce que ce sont des qualités qui vous rendent uniques, nous leur portons un soin particulier en nous appuyant sur trois piliers :
-Une meilleure intégration
-Une formation efficace
-Un accompagnement de nos experts durant toute l’aventure
Qu’attendez-vous ? Soumettez votre candidature et rejoignez une équipe où vous serez reconnu à votre juste valeur !
Sales Development Representative
Nous recrutons un
Sales Development Representative (SDR)
pour rejoindre notre équipe dynamique.
Votre rôle principal sera d’identifier de nouvelles opportunités commerciales, qualifier les prospects et contribuer activement à la croissance de l’entreprise.
🔹 Missions principales :
Prospecter et identifier de nouveaux leads.
Qualifier les besoins des prospects et prendre les premiers contacts.
Gérer le pipe commercial et assurer le suivi des opportunités.
Collaborer étroitement avec l’équipe commerciale.
🔹 Profil recherché :
Première expérience en prospection / développement commercial (idéalement en B2B) et solutions de paiement
Excellent sens de communication et aisance relationnelle.
Capacité à travailler avec des objectifs.
Motivation, persévérance et sens de l’organisation.
📍 Localisation :
Casablanca

At more than 100 award-winning properties worldwide, The Ritz-Carlton Ladies and Gentlemen create experiences so exceptional that long after a guest stays with us, the experience stays with them. Attracting the world’s top hospitality professionals who curate lifelong memories, we believe that everyone succeeds when they are empowered to be creative, thoughtful and compassionate.

your purpose,

Title: Technicien Informatique (H/F) - SAFRAN AEROSYSTEMS MOROCCO
Description:
"Safran est un groupe international de haute technologie opérant dans les domaines de l'aéronautique (propulsion, équipements et intérieurs), de l'espace et de la défense. Sa mission : contribuer durablement à un monde plus sûr, où le transport aérien devient toujours plus respectueux de l'environnement, plus confortable et plus accessible. Implanté sur tous les continents, le Groupe emploie 100 000 collaborateurs pour un chiffre d'affaires de 27,3 milliards d'euros en 2024, et occupe, seul ou en partenariat, des positions de premier plan mondial ou européen sur ses marchés.  Safran est la 2ème entreprise du secteur aéronautique et défense du classement « World's Best Companies 2024 » du magazine TIME.  Safran Aerosystems est l'un des leaders mondiaux des systèmes aéronautiques dédiés à la sécurité des avions et hélicoptères ainsi qu'à la gestion des fluides et du carburant. La société est un acteur clé dans le domaine de la sécurité des vols (oxygène, évacuation, flottabilités) et participe à la décarbonation de l'aviation grâce aux carburants alternatifs durables et aux nouvelles architectures moteurs. Elle compte 5200 collaborateurs répartis dans 7 pays."
Descriptif mission
Assurer le support informatique de niveau 1 et 2 auprès des utilisateurs du site  Diagnostiquer et résoudre les incidents matériels, logiciels et applicatifs  Installer, configurer et maintenir les postes de travail, périphériques et équipements informatiques  Participer à l'exploitation et à la maintenance des serveurs du site (surveillance, mises à jour, vérifications)  Contribuer au maintien en conditions opérationnelles (MCO) du système d'information  Appliquer les procédures et standards IT en vigueur (sécurité, accès, sauvegardes)  Participer au déploiement local de nouveaux équipements, systèmes ou services informatiques  Assister les équipes projets lors des phases d'installation et de mise en production  Suivre, traiter et clôturer les demandes et incidents via l'outil de ticketing  Rédiger et mettre à jour la documentation technique et les procédures d'exploitation  Veiller au respect des règles de sécurité informatique et des bonnes pratiques utilisateurs  Optimiser l'utilisation des outils informatiques et accompagner les utilisateurs au quotidien
Bac+2 en Informatique (DTS, BTS, DUT ou équivalent). Première expérience ou stage en support informatique / systèmes apprécié. Connaissances de base en : Systèmes Windows / Linux (notions) Réseaux (LAN, notions TCP/IP) Postes de travail et outils bureautiques Sens du service, rigueur, esprit d'équipe et bonnes capacités de communication.

Title: Leader Sport Manager "Responsable Rayon" (H/F)
Description:
Chez DECATHLON, les équipes sont engagées pour le sport
Notre entreprise aime valoriser les initiatives, elle permet à tous de s’investir et d’évoluer. “Jouer collectif” fait partie de notre ADN, nous gagnons ensemble uniquement si nous sommes une équipe unie et engagée.
Rejoins DECATHLON et intègre une entreprise où il fait bon vivre
Viens partager une passion collective pour le sport avec une équipe unie et motivée. Marque des points en prenant des responsabilités, exprime ton sens de l’initiative et contribue à rendre le sport accessible à tous. Une diversité de parcours s’offre à toi dans un environnement dynamique et changeante. Dès ton arrivée, tu prends la responsabilité d’une équipe au sein d’un magasin.
Ta mission met en valeur ton leadership
Entre dans le jeu avec la responsabilité d’un
projet Humain et Commercial
.Tu définis et mets en œuvre ce projet avec l’équipe que tu animes. Ensemble, vous relevez les défis que vous vous êtes fixés.
Ton terrain de jeu te permet de mettre tes compétences au service du sport
Tu es le coach/Leader de l’équipe, tu as la responsabilité managériale de celle-ci : le recrutement, la gestion des parcours, la formation et le développement des compétences, la planification.Plus important encore, tu assures le bien-être de chaque co-équipier-e.
Tu définis et tu animes le projet commercial de ton rayon : gestion de la gamme de tes produits, du linéaire, des stocks, et du dynamisme de vente. Tu joues collectif : toute l’équipe est ambassadrice de nos produits !
Responsable de ton compte d'exploitation et véritable pilote de ton activité, tu développes et gères tes ressources en toute autonomie pour atteindre les objectifs. Tu fais équipe avec le Leader du magasin qui te manage, et tu bénéficies d’un plan de formation pour t’accompagner dans la réussite de l’ensemble de tes missions.
Ton profil de sportif et tes qualités de leader nous intéressent !
De formation supérieure dans le domaine du commerce ou du management, ta passion du sport te donne l’avantage du terrain.Tel un coach sportif, tu as envie de faire grandir ton équipe, tu sais prendre des décisions, écouter et communiquer avec bienveillance et exigence.Audacieux-se, tu aimes relever des défis.Responsable, tu as aussi le sens du service client.Tu as de multiples cordes à ton arc : tu aimes être sur le terrain avec les clients, tu as l’esprit coopératif, tu es organisé-e, tu as aussi le sens du commerce et des chiffres.
Suivez toutes nos actualités sur : https://www.linkedin.com/company/maroc-decathlon/mycompany

Accompagner la direction dans l’aide à la décision financière

en contrôle de gestion (idéalement dans un environnement structuré ou multisites)

Title: Guest Communications VA – Marketing & Revenue Support (Vacation Rentals)
Description:
We are looking for a proactive and detail-oriented
Guest Communications Virtual Assistant
to support our vacation rental operations. This role focuses on managing guest conversations, assisting with social media and marketing efforts, and supporting revenue-related tasks to help maximize bookings and guest satisfaction.
This is an ideal role for someone who enjoys engaging with people, understands the hospitality mindset, and has exposure to short-term rental operations.
Key Responsibilities
Guest Communications
Manage guest inquiries across platforms (Airbnb, Vrbo, direct bookings, email, WhatsApp, etc.)
Respond to pre-booking, in-stay, and post-stay messages in a timely and professional manner
Build rapport with guests and ensure a smooth guest experience
Coordinate with internal teams to resolve guest concerns efficiently
Marketing & Social Media Support
Assist with social media posting, engagement, and basic content coordination
Respond to comments and messages on social platforms as needed
Support promotional campaigns, announcements, and listing visibility efforts
Maintain brand tone and consistency across communication channels
Revenue & Operations Support
Assist with pricing updates, calendar management, and availability checks
Support revenue management tasks such as rate adjustments and occupancy tracking
Monitor bookings, cancellations, and special offers
Maintain accurate records and update systems/CRMs
Requirements
Experience in guest communications, customer support, or hospitality (vacation rentals preferred)
Familiarity with Airbnb, Vrbo, or short-term rental platforms is a strong plus
Basic understanding of social media marketing and online engagement
Exposure to revenue management, pricing tools, or booking optimization is preferred
Strong written and verbal English communication skills
Highly organized, reliable, and comfortable working remotely

Title: Opérateur de Pelliculage
Description:
Sun Pharma est le quatrième plus grand génériqueur au monde et N°1 en Inde avec un chiffre d'affaires de plus de 4,5 milliards de dollars américains. Soutenus par plus de 40 sites de fabrication, nous fournissons des médicaments de haute qualité, accessibles et reconnus par les professionnels de santé et les patients, dans plus de 100 pays à travers le monde.
Notre passion pour la R&D nous a permis de développer plus de 2000 produits. Chez Sun, nous sommes Hommes et femmes, motivés par nos valeurs fondamentales d'innovation, humilité, intégrité & passion. Ces valeurs nous incitent à atteindre et à toucher des millions de vies dans le monde.
Au Maroc, nous sommes à la recherche d'un
Opérateur de Pelliculage
.
Responsabilités :
Maîtrise des procédés de pelliculage et revêtements galéniques en industrie pharmaceutique.
Connaissance des Bonnes Pratiques de Fabrication (BPF) et des normes qualité.
Capacité à préparer, régler et piloter les équipements de pelliculage ”nettoyage & Maintenance”
.
Rigueur dans le suivi des dossiers de lot et la traçabilité.
Aptitude à effectuer les contrôles qualité et ajustements nécessaires.
Respect strict des règles d’hygiène et de sécurité.
Esprit d’équipe et réactivité face aux anomalies.
Profil Recherché
:
Formation Bac+2 en Procédés Industriels, chimie, bio-industries ou équivalent.
Expérience de 5 à 8 ans en pelliculage au sein de l’industrie pharmaceutique.
Capacité à saisir des données de production, de lire des fiches techniques et des rapports qualité.
